actions.description: A list of action items that appear below the content of the List of action items rendered below the comment content
actions.description_zh: 在评论内容下面呈现的操作项列表

author.description: The element to display as the comment author
author.description_zh: 要显示为注释作者的元素

avatar.description: The element to display as the comment avatar - generally an antd Avatar or src
avatar.description_zh: 要显示为评论头像的元素 - 通常是 antd `Avatar` 或者 src

content.description: The main content of the comment

datetime.description: A datetime element containing the time to be displayed
